alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Cowley; Elk (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 11:58PM CDT until August 12 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Elk County in southeastern Kansas... Eastern Cowley County in south central Kansas... Northern Chautauqua County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burden, or 14 miles east of Winfield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Howard, Burden, Moline, Dexter, Grenola, Elk Falls, Cambridge, and Maple City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
